basic.blooming: Flowering period in summer and autumn
basic.color: Flower color light green or yellow, leaf color green and yellow white

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like low light level, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, fertilize with a low concentration on average every 2 weeks
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
